appliances;\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"30.6. to hang lighting fittings and other objects directly on wires Ventilation equipment shall be operated in accordance with the fire safety requirements laid down in the manufacturer’s manuals.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"37. Depending on the manufacturer’s requirements, but not less than once a year, it shall be necessary to check the technical condition of ventilation systems (fans, ducts, fire-suppression devices, irrigation chambers, etc.) and to clean the sediment accumulated in them, taking into account the manufacturer’s recommendations and/or requirements and the schedule approved by the company’s manager. The results of the inspection and cleaning shall be documented in writing.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"38.
